about_the_game:
"Inertial Craft" is a simple-to-operate racing game in a cyber world. You can experience a thrilling race with the strong and inertial behavior unique to a craft floating off the ground.
Enjoy unique behavior and UI for each craft.

Configuration compatible with all input devices
All operations in the game can be assigned by config.
Once set up, you can control all operations in the game using your favorite input device.

3 classes
There are three classes of increasing speed range: Class C, Class B, and Class A.
Class C is a low speed range that even those new to racing games can enjoy.
Class A is a high speed area that even advanced riders can enjoy.

Various modes
There are four modes: Campaign, Race, Duel, and Time Trial, each offering a different experience.

Campaign
You can earn coins by selecting a class and completing targets in the course and mode specified within the node, and proceed to the next node.
Coins can be used to purchase new crafts.

Race
You can compete against 7 opponent crafts.

Duel
You can play seriously against one opponent.
If you get ahead of your opponent, the gauge will decrease, and when it reaches 0, you can win on the spot.

Time Trial
You can run the course and measure your time with just one.

4 unique crafts
Each craft looks, behaves, and has a different UI.
We are also making balance adjustments for each class, and while prioritizing the time difference on the "SNAKE SHAKE" course to zero, we are making adjustments to preserve the individuality of each aircraft.

Original text is "Japanese"
